name: Structured Lesson Review

sections.instruction: Grammar topics covered with rules, examples, and exceptions noted.

sections.title: Pronunciation Notes
sections.instruction: Pronunciation corrections with phonetic guidance where possible.

sections.title: Conversation Topics
sections.instruction: Summary of conversation scenarios practiced and fluency observations.

sections.title: Corrections Made
sections.instruction: Detailed error corrections with explanations and correct forms.

sections.title: Key Phrases
sections.instruction: Important phrases and expressions to memorize, with context of use.

sections.title: Homework
sections.instruction: Assigned tasks with due dates and priority.

sections.title: Progress Notes
sections.instruction: Overall progress since last session, strengths, and areas needing work.
